text: 山下亨平时会收敛的部分，在两人独处的时候倒反不加掩饰地暴露本性。 他没有给森内贵宽喘息的机会，刚抽出一点的阴茎又狠狠往内里撞，咬着爱人的肩膀，贪心地在他身上吸吻留下痕迹。 森内贵宽撑在镜面上的手止不住地发抖，粗硬的性器操得又急又深，不是手指可以比拟的。 身下交合的部位泥泞不堪，吉他手扣住小主唱的手指，强硬地将他钉在镜子上，肉体相撞的声音一刻也没有停过，每一下都毫无保留地顶进湿热的深腔。
trans: Toru who usually restrains himself, would instead openly reveal his true nature when the two people are alone. He didn’t give Moriuchi Takahiro a chance to catch his breath that his penis, which had just been withdrawn a little, was thrust back in forcefully. Toru bit Moriuchi Takahiro’s shoulder, greedily kissing and leaving marks on his body. Moriuchi Takahiro’s hands, which were propping him up on the mirror, couldn’t stop trembling. The thick and hard sexual organ fucked fast and deep, which was fingers couldn’t compare to. The area where they were joined was a mess. The guitarist held the lead singer’s fingers tightly, pinning him to the mirror. The sound of their bodies colliding never stopped, each thrust going into the deep chamber with damp heat without reservation.
